Class PcapFilePacketSource

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.capture.pcap.PcapFilePacketSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
PacketSource, AutoCloseable
public final class PcapFilePacketSource extends Object implements PacketSource
PacketSource implementation that replays packets from an on-disk pcap or pcapng trace.

Provides the same RawFrame payloads produced by live capture so downstream pipelines can remain unchanged.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PcapFilePacketSource(Path pcapPath, String bpf, int snaplen)
    Creates an offline packet source using the default JNR libpcap adapter.
    PcapFilePacketSource(Path pcapPath, String bpf, int snaplen, Supplier<Pcap> pcapSupplier)
    Creates an offline packet source with an explicit Pcap supplier (primarily for tests).

  • Constructor Details

    • PcapFilePacketSource

      public PcapFilePacketSource(Path pcapPath, String bpf, int snaplen)
      Creates an offline packet source using the default JNR libpcap adapter.
      Parameters:
      pcapPath - path to an existing pcap or pcapng file
      bpf - optional BPF expression; blank disables filtering
      snaplen - snap length in bytes

    • PcapFilePacketSource

      public PcapFilePacketSource(Path pcapPath, String bpf, int snaplen, Supplier<Pcap> pcapSupplier)
      Creates an offline packet source with an explicit Pcap supplier (primarily for tests).
